replies.msg: 估計賣鞋開工利是係朱古力金幣

Engineering is an ideal career choice ! My friend Joe is a Taurus whereas his girlfriend is an Aquarius. Originally he had a press conference yesterday, along with many other people bit ot was delayed for five hours. As time went by tempers flared and harsh words were exchanged. Violence flared up as they scuffled. Several people who dressed in flared jeans were injured in scuffles with the security guards. As fighting flared up even some of the security guards were injured. Joe went back home early before the news conference started because he gave a barbecue party at his house. Some of his friends spilt too much oil when they were barbecuing the steaks, causing the barbecue to flare up. There was a sudden flare as his friends were barbecuing the chicken. As time passed the sky was getting darker so they began lighting candles. Some of the candles flared up and flickered. Others flickered and then went out. Joe set off the fireworks. His sister Katie helped let off the fireworks too. Everyone else stood there admiring the flares of the fireworks. After five hours the press conference finally began during which conflict flared up. At one point the conflict threatened to flare into a lawsuit. Half an hour later the conflict quieted down but trouble began to flare up in several other cities simultaneously. Katie has lots of clothes in her wardrobe such as a formal dress that glares out into a train, a pair of flares that flares at the ankle, skirt that flares just above the knees, a pair of chinos that flares just above the ankle, and a skirt with flares. Katie has a horse in her garden. It's funny. When Katie is late to feed her horse it'll flare its nostrils in anger then Katie's nostrils will flare back to communicate with it. Katie has a breezy smile and a breezy personality. She's an easy-going type of person. I like her breezy manner very much.
